name: Advanced Interviewing Techniques
description: Students analyze professional interviews, critique student interviews, conduct research and interview newsmakers. This is as much a "people" skills course as it is a course in learning how to ask the right questions. This course is taught at Centennial College and is open only to students in the Journalism Joint Program.
prerequisites: 12 credits, including JOUA06H3 & JOUB11H3 & JOUB14H3 & JOUB18H3
